105:                 
106:                 if (params["source"])
107:                         @source = Source.find(params["source"])
108:                         @precincts = @source.precincts
109:                 elsif (params["locality"])
110:                         @locality = Locality.find(params["locality"])
111:                         @precincts = @locality.precincts
112:                 elsif (params["ballot_drop_location"])
113:                         @ballot_drop_location = BallotDropLocation.find(params["ballot_drop_location"])
114:                         @precincts = @ballot_drop_location.precincts
115:                 else
116:                         @precincts = Precinct.find(:all)
117:                 end

 65:         def lookup
 66:                 #set defaults
 67:                 @params ||= params
 68:                 @params[:street_num] ||= ''
 69:                 @params[:street]     ||= ''
 70:                 @params[:city]       ||= ''
 71:                 @params[:state]      ||= ''
 72:                 @STATES = [['','']]+STATES
 73: 
 74:                 if request.post?
 75: #                       puts "got request"
 76: 
 77: #                       data = params[:form_data]
 78:                         data = Hash.new
 79:                         data[:street_num] = params[:street_num]
 80:                         data[:street] = params[:street]
 81:                         data[:city] = params[:city]
 82:                         data[:state] = params[:state]
 83:                         input_address = data[:street_num] + " " +
 84:                                         data[:street] + ", " +
 85:                                         data[:city] + ", " +
 86:                                         data[:state]
 87:                         #standardize address
 88:                         
 89:                         #still just a string, but at least it looks good 
 90:                         @ss = StreetSegment.new.find_by_address(data)
 91:                         if (!@ss.nil?) then
 92:                                 #puts "got ss"
 93:                                 @split    = @ss.precinct_split
 94:                                 @precinct = @split.nil? ? @ss.precinct : @split.precinct 
 95:                                 @contests = @split.nil? ? @precinct.contests : @split.contests
 96:                                 @polling_location = @precinct.polling_locations.first
 97:                                 @ev_locs = @precinct.ballot_drop_locations
 98:                         
 99:                                 @polling_loc_std = nil
100:                         end #!ss.nil?
101:                 end
102:         end
